abilityEffect.en: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Golduck is your Active Pokémon, you may flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon (choose 1 if there are 2) is now Confused. This power can't be used if Golduck is affected by a Special Condition.

effect.en: If the Defending Pokémon has any Special Energy cards attached to it, this attack does 30 damage plus 40 more damage.
